useCase.name: View and Edit Advertise
useCase.trigger: Admin requests to view and edit an advertisement

mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view list of advertisements
List Advertise View shows the list of advertisements
Admin clicks on the edit button for an advertisement
List Advertise View redirects to the edit advertise page
Edit Advertise View displays the advertisement details
Admin edits the advertisement data and clicks save
Edit Advertise View sends the information to Ads Controller
Ads Controller returns the saved data
Edit Advertise View shows the result of saving the advertisement
